intro.title: Tavern
intro.text: You step into an old tavern. The smell of wet wood and candle smoke fills the air.

choose_class.title: Prologue
choose_class.text: Before everything changes, you must choose your path.

after_class.title: Tavern
after_class.text: Your choice feels final. Tonight, hesitation will not be forgiven.

alley.title: Alley
alley.text: In a narrow alley, something stirs between shallow puddles.

win.title: Alley
win.text: It collapses. Your breathing is heavyâ€”yet you live.

to_ep2.title: Continue
to_ep2.text: You leave the alley behind. Ahead, the city gate awaits.

lose.title: Darkness
lose.text: You fall. The world fades, but the story isn't over.
